div.p:
In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be the ballies the xiij dai of Septembre
yer' et cetera lxxxiiij Johne of marr' has constitute and ordanit Dauid marr' his procura
tour topersew his richt and clame of the land and tenment the quhilk vmquhile John'
of marr' his fadir inhabite / and in al actionis and querelis concerning him todo folou and
defend as law wil like as he mycht do in propir persone / promittand tohald firm and sta
bil quhat thing his said procuratour lachfully ledis tobe done in his name

The xv dai of Septembre the yer' forsaid . the aldirman and ballies has assignit fridai
next tocum as dai peremptour to the merchandis of Sanctandrois on the ta part and Johne
thomson skippar' on the tuthir partie / for the determinacione of the debatis betuix thaim eftir
the tenour of the bil of complaint present be the saidis merchandis tharuppon ./ of the quhilk bil
the copy is decernit to the skippar and til ansuer' tharto on friday / borch for the intra of the
merchandis the said dai gilbert the vaus / and thom symson borch for the skippar'
in like wise

The samen dai Johne cristisone Wil henrison and androw yung merchandis of Sanctandrois
Johne colisone Dauid peblis Duncan of lyn and Johne eldar merchandis of saint Johneston'
comperand in Jugement protestit / that thai fal into na pley betuix thaim . and the said
Johne thomson thare skippar' . bot to ressave thare gudis and pay thare fraght
And gif the schip be fundin be the law to pas to the havyn quhare scho was frachtit
to / that scho sal fuyr thare gudis to the samyn havin on the said skipparis expens'

Item the said dai comperand before the aldirman ballies and consale in Jugement James cvmyn
grantit him awand til ser Johne striuelin chaplan of Sanct Johne the ewangelistis altar'
ten s' of mail for a croft tobe pait to the said ser John' at mertymes next tocum

The assise has ordanit Duncan stralogh seriand tomak marion' glennyis caldron'
alsgude as quhen it was borowit fra hir and to quyte it oute incontinent and de
liuer it til hir fra the man that has mendit it /

It is ordanit be the counsale for the strublance betuix thom symson callit
Jardyne and paule cutlar' that / quhilk of thaim strublis vthir in tym tocum salbe in wil
of the aldirman and ballies of bannysing of the toune

Item Dauid marr' ane of the ballies chargit Dauid galichtly toremain in
the tolbuthe quhil he restorit ane siluer belt til gilbert of chameris wif
And in like wise chargit patrik andirson throu his awne grant to byde in
the tolbuthe . quhil he relevit the said Dauid of that belt

Curia legalis burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxo die Septem
bris anno supradicto

The quhilk dai / Robert blindsel thomas prat and ser Johne striuelin witnes and
prefis producit be Alexander forbes in the actione debatabil betuix him and henry rede of Kin
corth quhilkis sworn deponit and declarit / that the said henry rede oblist him be his
hand topay to the said alexander forbes samekil fisch of Salmond as is contenit in
ane act optenit apon him be Johne of Knollis for ane half nettis fisching of the
fuyrdis to haf bein pait to the said alexander forbes be lammes last bypast for the quhilk
the said alexander oblist him to distroy ane summons of our Soueran lordis made apon
the said henry And atour the forsaidis Robert blindsel and thomas prat grantit that thai
com souerty to henry rede tokeip him scathles of the said salmond anent Johne of Knollis
and al vthiris swa that the said salmond had bene pait til alexander forbes at the said terme
of lammes

Duncan leis and Wat gernlaw convict be ane assise ilkane in amerciament for the wrang
wis' taking of certane lethir' fra James crag and Sandris iameson and to restore the said
lethir' to the fornemit personis

Item the said Duncan leis is conuict for breking of the seriandis arrest made apon the lethir'
and ordanit topay ij li' of wax to the hali blude lycht

Canne smyth is ordanit be ane assise toreleve Duncan stralogh seriand of the skath
of marion' glennyis caldron' like as he was adiugit be ane assise

The ballies has assignit til thom of marr' the law dai eftir michelmes . til answer'
to the borgh strekit be henry owrum for the wrangwis' halding fra him of a rydar' of
gold and j franche croune to compt and rekning

It is ordanit be the counsale gif ather' of James crag and Duncan leis distrublis vthir
in tym cuming beand convict tharof sal pay xl s' to Sanct nicolace wark vnforgevin

The xxiij dai of Septembre yer' et cetera lxxxiiij It is ordanit be the aldirman ballies and
certane of the counsale for the strublance and offens committit be patrik chavmer againis henry
bawne . that gif ony of thaim happinnis tomak ony sic strublans of vthir in tyme
cuming sal pay v merkis to Sanct nicholace wark at the wil of the party to the
quhilk ordinance the parties consentit Als' the aldirman pronuncit gif the said patrik strublit ony
vthir nichbur' of this burgh in tym tocum he suld vndirly the samen payn

The samyn dai in the tolbuthe of abirdene comperit before ane nobil and mychtie lord Wilyam
erle of erol et cetera and the aldirman and part of the consale / Wilyam blindsel patron' to Sanct
petris altar and protestit that quhat thing was done thare betuix John' colison on the
ta part and alexander menyes on the tudir partie anent the debate of a croft callit the
halylandis suld nocht hurt the feftment and the possession that the kirk is in wyntris
and yeris bigain before thir witnez alexander chamer of murchil robert blindsel James lesly
John' of Knollis ser alexander voket and vthiris sundrie

xxiiijto die Septembris anno Domini et cetera lxxxiiij Johannes de culan inuenit Andream branche
plegium legalem quod Dauid marr' et pars sua erunt indempnes de ipso Johanne et parte sua
aliter quam per viam Juris / quodque comparebit die Jouis cum andrea granty famulo suo in pretorio in
curia huius burgi ad instanciam dicti Dauid responsurus et Juri periturus

Item Dauid marr' dedit thomam symson plegium legalem quod Johannes de culan in
pars sua erunt indempnes de ipso David et parte sua ut supra / et quod comparebit dicto die
Jouis ad instanciam dicti Johannis ut premittitur

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per prepositum et balliuos eiusdem xxvto die mensis
Septembris anno Dominj supradicto /

quo die in presencia potentis dominj Willelmi comitis de
erol . Johannes colison exoneravit et quieteclamavit Alexandrum menyes de summa mille libra
rum inter ipsos pignerata et obligata penes croftum vocatum halyland Et similiter idem alexander
dictum Johannem inde quieteclamavit imperpetuum / et vtraque pars notas inde captas reuocavit

The samyn dai thomas of fife alexander rede gilbert the vaus Walter achneve gil
bert morison alexander hay androw murray eldar Johne stewart Robert prat adam of cra
furd Richart hil William of geruiach John' glenmaluin Ranald talyour and Dauid prat burgez
of abirdene chosin and sworn in ane assise toknaw and declare quha is lachful posses
sour' of a croft callit the halylande debatabil betuix alexander menyes on the ta part
and Johne colison on the tuthir partie / The quhilk assise riply avisit the euidentis
richtis and documentis of the parties before thaim producit sene and considirit / has fundin decre
tit and deliuerit / that the said Johne colison is laghful possessour' of the said croft
callit the halyland / and acht to remayn with his possessioun for ocht that thai
haf sene in the contrare /

The xxvij dai of the moneth of Septembre forsaid . It is fullely appointit and accordit
betuix henry bawne and John' the vaus in presence of the aldirman and ballies in a fens
sit court anens the clame of iiij li' of blak money clamit be the said henry
that the said Johne as he allegit suld haf relevit him anent Androw galichtlie
in fourm as eftir folowis that is tosay the said henry sal pay of the said sowme
eftir the deliuerence of the assise tharuppon twa merkis And for the tuthir twa
merkis thare is cumin dettour topay for Johne the vaus the lard of Durris Ro
bert blindsel Johne colison and alexander rede tobe pait be yule next tocum And
the said Johne is oblist toreleve thaim of the payment of the saidis twa merkis

the samen dai It was fundin and deliuerit be ane assise that William quelp sulde
releve thom rolland of a barrel of salmond anent Wilyam moyses within
terme of law et cetera

The samyn dai in presence of a nobil and mychtie lord William erle marschel the aldirman and
counsale vndirwritin has grantit til Johne colison ane burges at his awne chesing
for the quhilk he sal pay til Dauid menyes xl s' for his labouris made with a commis
sion' of the toune before the lordis / and the said Dauid sal pay his hail wattir mail of
this yer' / and thir ar the names of the said consale / Alexander chamer alexander menyes James
lesly Robert blindsel John' of Knollis thomas fife alexander rede William blindsel Johne
Wormot Dauid marr' androw culan William Kintor androw branche Johne the vaus John'
menyes

Item the aldirman and consale forsaid has ordanit Alexander menyes topay the vij li' ix s'
iiij d' quhilkis he clamit alexander chamer / and to folow the said alexander chamer lachfully tharuppon

Item in presence of the said lord the consale has ordanit that James lesly sal pay his wattir
mail of this yer' to the ballies / and that the aldirman sal pay til mastir thomas stra
thachin maistir of the gramar' scule v li' for this yer' / and the said mastir tobe cal
lit before the aldirman and consale tose him dischargit of the said pension' in defaute of
his seruice eftir the tenor of the act / made tharuppon

The aldirman and counsale has assignit til lord Erskin and til my lord marschel
his procuratour in payment of the said lord erskynnis yerlie pensioune of jC li' acht
til him be the toune / the fermes and malis of the fisching of the Raik togiddir with a part
of the malis of the fishing of the mydchingil to the fulfilling of the said yerlie
pencion' of ane hundreth pundis / and the names of the dettouris of the said malis
salbe deliuerit in write to the said lord and his procuratouris

Item the aldirman and consale in presence of the forsaid lord has ordanit that Johne Wormot salhaf
twa s' for the presentacion of thare commission' in edinburgh / and tilhaf nane vthir expensis
for his clame considiring that he was thare before in the execucion of his awne erandis

And thir ar' the names of the personis assignit to the payment of the forsaid lord erskynis
pensioune that is tosay Of the Raik Robert blindsel vj li' x s' v d' Alexander of
chavmer the fadir alexander menyes alexander of marr' thomas fife James lesly John' of
culan Johne colison maistir Androw cadiow alexander chamer the son and gilbert the vaus
ilkane of thaim yerlie vj li' x s' and v d' Summa iijxx xj li' xiiij s' vij d'
Item of the mydchingil Johne colisone v li' x s' and v d' Alexander rede alexander of marr'
the videu of alexander howison and Dauid menyes yongar ilkane of thaim yerlie v li'
x s' v d' Item Dauid Kintor yerlie a mark Summa xxviij li' v s' and v d'
Summa totalis jc

The secund dai of october' yer' of god et cetera lxxxiiij In the tolbuthe of abirdene It was
ordanit and decretit for law and consuetude be the aldirman ballies and consale that peter
craw awnar' of the kervel callit James of the Sluys' sal content and pay til Dauid
menyes maistir of Sanct nicholace wark the some' of xxxvj s' scottis for vthir half
tvn fraght of thre raissys bigane that is tosay for every rais' half ane
tvn .

Curia capitalis burgi de Aberdene' tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem
die lune quarta die mensis octobris proximo post fetum beati michaelis
archangeli Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo quarto
quo die curia affirmata et sectis vocatis absentes patent in Rotulo sectarum

Quo die Alexander de camera electus fuit in prepositum pro anno futuro
in dicto officio fideliter seruiturus / et Johannes colison Dauid menyes
Junior Alexander rede et Andreas branche . electi fuerunt in balliuos
et philippus Dunbrek Alexander de camera moricius beset et Duncanus
straloch electi fuerunt in seriandos . in dictis suis officius pro presenti
anno fideliter ministraturi / presunt per eos et eorum quemlibet Juramento
solito et consueto

div.head:
Inquisicio electa pro deseruicione breuis adepti per
Alexandrum skene de eodem et cetera de certis terris et annuis
redditibus infra burgum de Aberdene ./
div.p:
Dominus Johannes Rudirfurd de mygvy miles Thomas fif Johannes
Wormot Johannes cullane Willelmus aberdour' Alexander marr' Jacobus
crake gilbertus morison' Willelmus garviach' / gilbertus leche
symon gardin Duncanus smyth Alexander nachty thomas symson'
quj Jurati deseruierunt In omnibus punctis et articulis pro parte domini
Alexandri In dicto breui expressatis . racione hereditaria patris
sui gilbertj skene / et cetera prout in attornato . desuper confecto plenius

Eodem die dominus Dauid crukschank capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Duthaci
situati in ecclesia parrochiali burgi de Aberdene accedens ad barram protestatus fuit
pro quodam annuo redditu xij s' et vj d' dicto altari pertinen' et a longo
tempore insolut' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in le schipraw prout in processibus
precedentibus continetur ad quam terram accessit cum seriando et testibus subscriptis et
nichil inuenit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia tanquam tercio
die huius processus / philippo Dunbrek seriando / testibus Johanne rede et
Waltero quhytelaw ac Duncano straloch' In premissis Iuratis et cetera

Item dominus Alexander club capellanus altaris sancte crucis . In dicta ecclesia
parrochiali / beati nichalij de Aberdene' accedens ad barram protestatus fuit
pro annuo redditu . xiij s' et iiijor d' dicto altari debit' de quadam terra
vasta In le gast Raw inter terram Johannis Knollis ex parte boreali
et terram hered' quondam Dauid paterson . ex australi parte . et ibidem nichil
inuenit distringibile . preter terram et lapides . quos presentauit In curia tanquam
prima die huius processus sub / et cetera . philippo Dunbrek seriando / ac roberto
tailyeour et Jacobo liberton' testibus in premissis Juratis et cetera

Dominus Dauid Waus capellanus altaris beate marie magdalene
protestatus fuit pro quodam annuo redditu sibi debit' et a longo
tempore insolut' de quadam terra in vico viridj inter terram dicti domini Dauid
ex boreali parte et terram quondam patricij coupar ex australi et ad eandem
terram cum seriando et subscriptis testibus accedens nichil inuenit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quas presentauit in curia tanquam secunda die huius
processus / et cetera / Alexandro chamour seriando henrico quitebr'ebr' overwrites something else.ow et
patricio styklaw testibus Juratis et cetera

Item et eodem die frater Johannes Ratree prior fratrum carmelitarum burgi
de Aberdene . protestatus fuit pro quodam annuo redditu . sex solidorum octo
denariorum priori et conuentui dicti ordinis debitorum et a longo tempore non solut'
de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico inferiorj quo itur ad ecclesiam beati
nicholaij ex boreali parte eiusdem vicj prout in superioribus processibus plenius
continetur et accedens ad dictam terram nichil inuenit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos presentauit in curia tanquam tercia die huius processus / testibus
patricio steklaw et Jacobo clerk ac Alexandro chamour seriando ./

Item et eodem die dictus prior carmelitarum simili modo / accedens ad quandam
terram vastam . Jacentem in le grene ex parte boreali vici eiusdem nichil inuenit
distringibile pro annuo redditu vigintj denariorum sibi et suis fratribus debitorum et
a longo tempore insolutorum preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia tanquam
tercia die huius processus / prefatis seriando et testibus super huiusmodi Juratis
et examinatis et cetera et protestatus fuit pro administracione Juris et Justicie sibi
in premissis futuris temporibus facienda /

Eodem die magister Andreas cadyou plegius patricij murref tercia die
vocatus ad intrandum dictum patricium Responsurus Dauid theman pro iniusta detencione
vij scutorum aureorum vel precij eorundem / non comparuit per se neque comparere
fecit dictum patricium / quare adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie / pro sua contumacia
et absencia et precipitur seriando quatenus ipsum premuniat ad intrandum proximo die
Iuridica pro quarto et peremptorio die et cetera

Dicta die Johannes fechet ad instanciam thome simson' Responsurus pro
minus iusta detencione septem coronarum et sex solidorum Restancium . eidem insolut'
vocatus vt die peremptorio eidem Johanni presens assignato ad probandum
dictam summam sibi thome fuisse satisfactam vel pro eadem dic prout
Juris ordo postulat et exquirit Juri periturus / non comparuit quare
legittima diei hora exspectata / et curia super hoc legittime auisata
dictus Johannes . per os Willelmi seref aden Judicatoris curie expriment
adiudicatus fuit ad dictam summam septem coronarum et sex solidorum
dicti thome infra terminum Juris persoluend'

Item it was ordanit and assignit be the baillies that this day xv dais
patrik andirson to prefe that the comptour my lady forbes has in hir
chamour belangis til him / and that beand done sufficiently the
said patrik to haue Justice ministirit til him in the said mater'

vjto die octobris anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto in pretorio coram ballivis Willelmus quhite constituit Alexandrum
forbes procuratorem suum ad prosequendum legittime actionem suam aduersus Johannem grig / Ipso promittens de rato et cetera

Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per prepositum balliuos et confratres gilde die
veneris octaua die octobris anno Dominj supradicto

div.head: Electi in communes consiliarios
div.p:
Johannes ruthirfurd de migvy miles
- Alexander menyes
- Jacobus lesly
Robertus blindsel
- Johannes de Knollis
- Thomas de fife
- Willelmus blindsel
Andreas culan senior
- Dauid marr'
- Dauid mathoson'
- alexander de marr'
alexander hay
- Johannes de culane
- alexander de camera filius
- Johannes Wormot
- thomas prat
- Dauid symson
- Adam de craufurd
- gilbertus vaus
- Willelmus de Kintor
- Walterus achneif
- Johannes malisson
- Willelmus malissone
- Gilbertus morison

div.head: Appreciatores carnium
div.p:
Jacobus de Kintor Johannes stewart gilbertus morison' Simon de gardin Andreas murra iunior
Thomas de culan Jacobus Kennarty Dauid galichtlie andreas Wenton' Dauid spens tho
mas gardnar Nicholaius baxtar henricus bawne alexander rolland tollar' Walterus de
mernys gilbertus leth /

div.head: Gustatores ceruisie
div.p:
In li evin quartar cum philippo Dunbrek sergeando nicholaius leil et Willelmus sprunt / In li crukit quartar
alexandrichamer sergeandi georgeus Dys' et andreas tulidef Item pro li greyn quartar Duncan straloch sergeand'
henricus lorn et robertus sleich Et in quarterio de futy pro moricio besat sergeando

Eodem die Alexander ranyson' posuit se in voluntate ballivorum pro perturbio seruitorum suj vnde
adiudicatur in amerciamento

Georgeus browne conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis lilburn
Jonete lilburn ac filie eiusdem Jonete et Willelmi malisson' et tenetur emendare
eisdem ad visum proborum virorum / cuj iniungitur pro emenda dare ij li' cere ad lumen Sancti
sanguinis antequam exeat de pretorio Et per consilium ordinatur quod si dictus georgeus talem
imposterum fecerit offensam et prouocacionem malicie contra prefatas personas vnam aut plures
aut quemcumque alium vicinum huius ville amittet et perdet libertatem suam imperpetuum
Item Johannes lilburn in amerciamento pro perturbio georgij broun / et dabit j libra cere ad dictum lumen

The action persewit be Dauid menyes yongar procuratour til androw andirson anentis x li' g'
clamit be reson' of lotting vpon certane merchandis of abirdene be the said androw becaus'
Androw murra eldar and Johne glenmaluin twa of the said merchandis allegit that thare docu
ment of the said matir was than absent the aldirman and ballies be the decrete of the
court with consent of parties has assignit to the saidis androw murra and Johne glenmaluin
this dai xxtj daies tovndirly the determinacion of ane sworn assise apon the said
caus' les than thai bring than the kingis lettrez distroyand and adnulland the
lettres producit and schewne this dai be David menyes in the forsaid matir

It is fundin and decretit be ane sworn assise / James lesly forspekar that Johne lit
star' in the grene is quyte of the clame of androw vaus' of xlvj s' / and the said
androw in amerciament for his wrangwis' persute

the aldirman and consel has chosin Johne of Knollis John' colison thom prat gil
bert the vaus and adam of crafurd auditouris sworn of Dauid menyes eldaris
a compt of the kirk wark

Item the counsale deliueris gif the said Dauid menyes can mak gude that he
was feit til ane certane terme dai / that he salbe payt of his fee

The samyn dai the counsale and brethir of the gild has statute and ordanit for
the common' gude of the toune and reule of merchandis' for this yere

In the first that al foristallaris baith within burgh and vteu be punyst eftir the
auld statutis of the toune made of before tyme

Item that thare be na flesch nor talch had oute of this toune vndir pane of
eschete of the samyn et cetera

Item it is ordanit that the baxtaris sal mak the twa penny lais contenand xxxij
vncis of gude bakin brede / and the penny laif of xvj vncis thareftir
Item that the caik bakaris sal mak xxiiij vncis the pennyworth of cakis

Item it is statute / quhare ony trespas is done in the toune / that thare salbe orda
nit certane wax tobe gevin to the haly blude licht

Item it is ordanit that ilke yer' fra thine furth thare salbe chosin twa maistiris
of the kirk wark

Johne of culan and Walter achneve ar chosin and ordanit maistiris of the kirk wark
for this yer' / toserue apon thare awne expensis to the quhilk office thai ar
sworn todo thare diligence and trew ministracion'

It is ordanit be the counsale and communite that gif it hapnis ony nichbur' tobe
inquiet or strublit be ony land man the nichburis beand chargit tocum to
the officeris and ga with thaim in thare supple and of thare nichburis / and wil nocht cum
that thai sall pay xl s' vnforgevin to the mending of the key and making of the beiknis

Item that ilke lord salbe assignit quhare thai salbe payt of thare pensiones / and that
na nichbur' of the toune poynd thare malys for ony det / bot gif thai schaw
sufficient acquittance to the toune of the pensionaris that thai suld be gevin' to

Alexander menyes and thom prat ar ordanit to big the beiknys and the key quhilk
thai haf tane with / and quhat cost thai mak tharapon the aldirman sal refund
and pay thaim of the rediast siluer that he may get of foristallaris

Item it is ordanit that al flescharis slayand flesch within the toune sal present the
talch of the flesch that thai slaa in the oulk on the Settirday alsweil as the
flesch vndir pane of eschete of the talch

Item that the candil wrichtis mak of gude stuf the pund of candil for iij d' vndir pain
of eschete of the candil and viij s' for the vnlau et cetera
